# Dwarves
Dwarves are a stout and hardy mutation of Humans that have developed highly evolved livers.
## Physiology
The primary difference between Dwarves and Humans is that their livers can metabolize alcohol similarly to medicines, healing [color=#ec3a3a]Brute[/color] and [color=#ec3a3a]Heat[/color] damage. Few also know, however, that Dwarves tend to asphyxiate twice as much as Humans.
